tasks.title: Freeze Engine/Client ownership contract in canonical docs

issues.title: Boundary enforcement and regression guards
issues.description: Boundary violations can silently reappear after refactors. Add enforceable checks and regression guards so forbidden coupling is detected early and consistently.

tasks.title: Harden boundary checks for forbidden coupling and direct frontend Engine reads
tasks.summary: Adjust boundary guard scripts to catch forbidden imports/DB coupling and ensure they stay integrated into split smoke checks.

issues.title: Baseline contour validation
issues.description: The current split contour lacks a reproducible validation baseline. Define and run explicit contour validation with clear pass/fail semantics.

tasks.title: Validate local/dev split contour and document failure semantics
tasks.summary: Run split startup/health/bridge/boundary checks and document pass/fail expectations for reproducible Milestone 1 baseline validation.

features.title: Automate repeatable workflow and pipeline operations with scripts.
features.description: This feature introduces automate repeatable workflow and pipeline operations with scripts and defines the expected behavior, boundaries, and outcome for implementation.

issues.title: CLI and base workflow commands
issues.description: The workflow needs a stable CLI foundation for core feature operations. Implement base command surfaces with deterministic behavior and output contracts.

tasks.title: Add `dev/workflow` CLI entrypoint and command router
tasks.summary: Create the workflow CLI entrypoint with routing for feature/task/confirm/validate command groups used by the process flow.

tasks.title: Implement feature base commands for create/plan/approve/execution-plan
tasks.summary: Implement base feature commands (`create`, `plan-init`, `plan-lint`, `approve`, `execution-plan`) with approved-state gates and deterministic output contracts.

issues.title: Tracking sync and validations
issues.description: Tracking state can drift between local artifacts and break execution flow. Synchronize DEV_MAP, TASK_LIST, and pipeline updates as one consistent operation.

tasks.title: Implement `plan tasks for feature --write` for DEV_MAP/TASK_LIST/PIPELINE
tasks.summary: Implement sync command that applies approved manual decomposition delta to the three local trackers in one change set.

tasks.title: Add task_count-based allocation, ownership checks, and tracking/repo validation
tasks.summary: Enforce task ID allocation only via `task_count`, verify ownership markers and parent chains, and provide `validate --scope tracking|repo` checks.

issues.title: Materialize/Confirm integration and protocol contract
issues.description: Materialize and confirm flows can diverge between local and remote state. Align both flows to one protocol contract with deterministic update behavior.

tasks.title: Implement `feature materialize` with canonical branch policy and milestone assignment
tasks.summary: Implement feature materialization from local issue nodes to GitHub with milestone resolution and canonical branch linkage persistence.

tasks.title: Implement `confirm task|issue|feature|standalone-issue` cascade with GitHub close
tasks.summary: Implement confirmation commands that cascade local status updates, cleanup pending-only pipeline entries, and close mapped GitHub issues in the same run.

tasks.title: Refactor process docs to split responsibilities and remove duplicated rules
tasks.summary: Eliminate concrete process conflicts and duplication across AGENTS.md, TASK_EXECUTION_PROTOCOL.md, FEATURE_PLANNING_PROTOCOL.md, and FEATURE_WORKFLOW.md by fixing one canonical command order (sync before materialize), assigning one owner per concern, and replacing repeated normative blocks with explicit cross-references.

issues.title: Workflow CLI hardening and missing contracts completion
issues.description: Several CLI paths still have weak validation and incomplete edge-case handling. Harden command contracts so failures are explicit, predictable, and actionable.

tasks.title: Make `dev/workflow` executable and align smoke entrypoint
tasks.summary: Set executable mode for `dev/workflow` and update smoke checks to run canonical `./dev/workflow` command.

tasks.title: Implement `task preflight|validate` command contracts
tasks.summary: Replace placeholder handlers with deterministic preflight/validate checks and stable JSON output contracts.

tasks.title: Complete `feature create --github` feature-issue wiring
tasks.summary: Implement feature-level GitHub issue create/update with milestone mapping and persist `gh_issue_number/gh_issue_url` in DEV_MAP during `--write`.

tasks.title: Split workflow command internals by responsibility
tasks.summary: Extract delta parsing, tracker writes, and git/github adapters from monolithic command modules while preserving CLI behavior.

tasks.title: Add regression smoke scenarios for full workflow chain
tasks.summary: Cover success and gate-fail paths for create/plan/approve/sync/materialize/execution-plan/confirm flows.

issues.title: JSON-only tracker storage for task list and execution pipeline
issues.description: Mixed tracker formats increase parsing complexity and state drift risk. Move runtime tracking to JSON-only contracts for consistent behavior.

tasks.title: Define canonical JSON contracts for task list and pipeline
tasks.summary: Introduce strict JSON structures for TASK_LIST and TASK_EXECUTION_PIPELINE and lock Markdown out of runtime source role.

tasks.title: Switch workflow readers/writers from Markdown trackers to JSON
tasks.summary: Migrate feature/task/confirm/validate command data paths to JSON tracker files while preserving command semantics.

tasks.title: Migrate existing tracker data to JSON with deterministic conversion

tasks.title: Align smoke checks and protocols with JSON-only tracker mode
tasks.summary: Update workflow smoke and protocol docs so tracker operations use JSON-only sources consistently.

issues.title: Scoped materialization for one child issue (`--issue-id`)
issues.description: Materialize currently applies too broadly when only one issue needs synchronization. Add explicit single-issue targeting with ownership validation via --issue-id.

tasks.title: Add --issue-id selector for materialize issue modes
tasks.summary: Extend feature materialize arguments to accept a specific child issue ID in issues-create and issues-sync modes.

tasks.title: Enforce issue ownership and scoped execution

issues.title: Issue creation command for feature/standalone with optional plan init

tasks.title: Implement create-only materialize behavior for child issues
tasks.summary: In issues-create mode create only unmapped child issues and skip mapped issues without gh issue edit calls.

tasks.title: Add smoke coverage for create-only no-edit path
tasks.summary: Add regression checks that mapped child issues are not edited in issues-create mode.

issues.title: Add workflow CLI show/status commands for feature/issue/task
issues.description: Operators lack quick CLI visibility into feature and issue state. Add show/status commands for faster inspection and debugging.

issues.title: Sync feature-issue checklist on child issue materialize and confirm
issues.description: Feature-level checklist state becomes stale after child issue changes. Keep checklist markers synchronized during materialize and confirm flows.

tasks.title: Append missing child-issue checkboxes in feature issue during materialize
tasks.summary: When child issues are materialized ensure feature-level issue body contains checklist lines for missing child issues.

tasks.title: Update feature-issue checklist state on confirm issue done
tasks.summary: When confirming issue done update corresponding checkbox to checked state in feature-level GitHub issue.

issues.title: Require explicit materialize mode (`bootstrap|issues-create|issues-sync`)
issues.description: Materialize behavior is ambiguous without an explicit mode selector. Require bootstrap/create/sync mode and enforce mode-specific semantics.

tasks.title: Require --mode for feature materialize and validate enum
tasks.summary: Update CLI parser so feature materialize fails without mode and accepts only bootstrap, issues-create, issues-sync.

tasks.title: Split materialize flow into explicit mode handlers
tasks.summary: Implement separate code paths for bootstrap, issues-create, and issues-sync with deterministic output action labels.

tasks.title: Align protocol and workflow docs with required mode contract
tasks.summary: Update protocol/workflow docs and smoke expectations to reflect required mode and mode-specific behavior.

issues.title: Add issue-level Approved gate before execution/materialization
issues.description: Execution can start before issue readiness is explicitly approved. Enforce an issue-level Approved gate before execution and materialization.

tasks.title: Add issue-level Approved transition in confirm contract
tasks.summary: Support explicit confirm issue approved and persist issue status lifecycle Planned -> Approved -> Done.

tasks.title: Gate execute/materialize issue paths by issue Approved status
tasks.summary: Block execute issue and materialize issues modes when issue status is not Approved and add clear gate error messages.

issues.title: Auto-delete sync delta file after successful decomposition write
issues.description: Processed sync delta files can accumulate and be reused accidentally. Remove delta artifacts automatically after successful decomposition writes.

issues.title: Replace checkbox-based GitHub issue body with description-driven readable content
issues.description: Checkbox-heavy issue bodies are noisy and difficult to read. Replace them with concise narrative descriptions that explain intent and problem clearly.

tasks.title: Add issue description field contract to DEV_MAP and sync path
tasks.summary: Extend issue-node contract and decomposition sync handling so issue description can be persisted and used as canonical human-readable issue context.

tasks.title: Implement deterministic description generation and backfill
tasks.summary: Generate default issue descriptions from title and mapped tasks, and backfill missing descriptions for existing local issue nodes.

tasks.title: Rewrite child issue body renderer to description-driven format
tasks.summary: Replace checkbox transport in child issue body rendering with concise readable sections sourced from issue descriptions.

tasks.title: Rewrite feature issue body and remove checklist coupling
tasks.summary: Render feature-level issue body as readable summary with child issue references and decouple confirm/materialize flows from checklist patching.

tasks.title: Add smoke/docs coverage for description-based body sync
tasks.summary: Update smoke checks and workflow docs to enforce no-checkbox body policy and cover mapped GitHub body resync behavior.

issues.title: Feature materialize: reconcile GitHub sub-issues from DEV_MAP issue set
issues.description: Parent feature sub-issues can drift from mapped local issue state. Reconcile GitHub sub-issues from DEV_MAP mappings to keep hierarchy consistent.

tasks.title: Add GitHub adapter helpers for feature sub-issues operations
tasks.summary: Implement deterministic list/add sub-issue API helpers with explicit error handling for unsupported responses and permission failures.

tasks.title: Reconcile parent feature sub-issues during materialize
tasks.summary: Update materialize issues-create and issues-sync flows to reconcile parent sub-issues from current mapped DEV_MAP issues and return deterministic sync payload fields.

tasks.title: Cover reconcile idempotency and partial mapping behavior
tasks.summary: Add smoke scenarios and docs updates for first-run add, second-run no-op, and explicit reporting of skipped unmapped issues.

tasks.summary: Add parser/reconciliation logic that maps issue-plan block presence in FEATURE_PLANS to Pending/Planned status for active issues.

tasks.title: Add lint and smoke coverage for Pending/Planned split
tasks.summary: Add regression checks for Pending defaults, Pending->Planned transition, and deterministic mismatch errors.

tasks.title: Add reject issue command and local Rejected transition
tasks.summary: Extend confirm/issue flow with explicit reject issue command that validates ownership and updates local issue status to Rejected.

tasks.title: Close mapped GitHub issue with rejection marker

tasks.title: Enforce strict lint for issue-plan block hierarchy

tasks.title: Normalize existing issue-plan blocks and add regression checks
tasks.summary: Migrate existing issue-plan entries to canonical format and add smoke checks for parser/lint stability.

tasks.title: Add plan-issue smoke coverage and protocol updates

Add a dedicated sync feature command that updates only feature-level remote metadata/body for one feature id, one milestone id, or all features.
